title: SOP Updates SOP
description: Standard Operating Procedure for updating existing SOPs
purpose: Ensure SOP updates are systematic, version-controlled, and properly communicated to team
scope: All updates to existing SOPs in the DevSOP system

roles.sop_updater: Person making changes to existing SOP
roles.sop_reviewer: Team member reviewing updates for accuracy
roles.team: Development team using the updated SOP

trigger_conditions: Process improvement identified in existing SOP
Tool or technology change affecting SOP steps
Team feedback indicating SOP clarity issues

steps.description: Document what needs to change and why
Modify the SOP JSON file with changes
requirements: Add to change log if needed

steps.when: Only if SOP file path, name, or major type changes

steps.description: Validate the updated procedure works as expected

steps.format: git commit -m 'docs: update [sop-name] SOP v[version] - [brief change description]'

success_criteria: Team can successfully execute updated procedure
